labels.name: duplicate
labels.description: This issue or pull request already exists

labels.name: wontfix
labels.description: This will not be worked on

issues.title: CDDL for protocol mapping placement in SDF docs
issues.author: lorenzocorneo
issues.body:
Suggesting improvement to add a CDDL snippet showing the delta between original SDF and the proposed protocol mapping extension.

``` cddl
propertyqualities = {
 ? observable: bool
 ? readable: bool
 ? writable: bool
 ? sdfProtocolMap ; this is the delta
 ~dataqualities
}
```

Just saying that sdfProtocolMap can be added as named quality does not help much the implementors of the spec, imo.

comments.author: rohitmohan96
comments.body:
Yes, I wasn't sure what would be the write way to represent this in the CDDL without including the entire SDF CDDL.
I guess, just a diff would suffice?

comments.author: JKRhb
comments.body:
I guess for defining the extensions, you could (or should?) also use the mechanisms defined in the CDDL RFC: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc8610#section-3.9

(I tried to apply the syntax in [PR](https://github.com/ietf-wg-asdf/sdf-relations/pull/6) against the `sdf-relations` repository, but I am not entirely sure if I used it correctly.)

issues.title: Inclusion of protocol mappings models in this draft
issues.author: lorenzocorneo
issues.body: Creating this issue to discuss on wether to include the BLE, Zigbee, HTTP protocol mappings in this draft. One alternative could be to just describe sdf protocol mappings in this draft, and having separate drafts for BLE, Zigbee, HTTP, etc...

comments.author: rohitmohan96
comments.body: I think we should have BLE and zigbee as part of this draft, since the NIPC draft will depend on this, and that way we can get moving quickly.

issues.title: Protocol mapping usage
issues.author: lorenzocorneo
issues.body: Protocol mappings is currently written in several inconsistent ways, e.g., Protocol Mapping, Protocol mapping. Let's decide on one way and make it consistent throughout the text.

issues.title: Add examples for HTTP and COAP
issues.author: bbrinckman
issues.body:
The document talks about protocol mapping for IP and Npn-IP protocols, with HTTP and CoAP as examples for IP.
There are no examples on IP-based mapping. We should add HTTP and CoAP examples.

comments.author: lorenzocorneo
comments.body: Yes, and instead we have mappings to Open API. Do we want to keep this? what is the rationale to have that?

issues.title: Is protocol mapping the right name?
issues.author: lorenzocorneo
issues.body: During the last interim the working group members suggested to spend some time pondering on whether protocol mapping is the terminology we want to use. Let's use this issue to discuss.

pulls.title: Use extension point in CDDL
pulls.author: rohitmohan96
pulls.body:
Added an appendix section with the combined cddl. 

Address #1

pulls.title: HTTP and CoAP
pulls.author: lorenzocorneo
pulls.body:
# HTTP and CoAP SDF Protocol Mappings

This PR aim is to add SDF Protocol Mappings for HTTP and CoAP. It addresses the issue #5.

CoAP is still missing.

This PR currently features:
- **OpenAPI CDDL and structure change**
- **Draft of HTTP protocol mapping**
